#ddd;text-transform:none}.cr-btn.cr-btn-simple:hover{background:#efefef}.cr-btn.cr-btn-plain{padding:0;text-align:left;text-transform:inherit}.cr-btn.cr-btn-more{font-family:inherit;font-size:12px;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.5px}.cpm-rating-more-wrap{display:none;margin-top:15px;text-align:center}.cpm-rating-more-wrap
